channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Perfect Survey
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Perfect Survey

item.title: CVE-2021-24762|2024-08-03T19:42:17.219Z -- unknown -- perfect%20survey
item.description: The Perfect Survey WordPress plugin before 1.5.2 does not validate and escape the question_id GET parameter before using it in a SQL statement in the get_question AJAX action, allowing unauthenticated users to perform SQL injection.
